subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy held off Louis Oosthuizen and Tiger Woods at the Deutsche Bank Championship in a finish that left the American Ryder Cup captain, Davis Love III, facing tough choices.
snippet: Rory McIlroy held off Louis Oosthuizen and Tiger Woods at the Deutsche Bank Championship in a finish that left the American Ryder Cup captain, Davis Love III, facing tough choices.
